name: NOXIAM -miserable sinners
description:
NOXIAM -miserable sinners-
Run away. From this spooky mansion.

You are in a huge mysterious mansion.
Let's run away from here.
Strange sounds, shadows and strange puzzles are waiting for you.
Come to this creepy world.

This work also supports VR.
This work can be played without a VR device.
VR support is currently only Oculus Lift + Oculus Touch.

·Method of operation
Mouse: Move viewpoint
Left click: Hold the weapon
Right click: Use weapon
W: Go forward
A: Go left
S: Go backwards
D: Go right
E: Check / use items
Shift: run
P: Pause
Esc: End of game
